p: Lastly, we analyzed the vulnerability of major protected areas (i.e., those of area >200 km 2; data available from www.protectedplanet.net/) of the Americas based on the various velocity metrics, by calculating the mean of velocity values within the extent of the protected area. Plotting the relative ranking of protected areas based on the four metrics (forward and backward climatic and biotic velocity) demonstrated how multiple metrics may be visually integrated and interpreted to support a multi-faceted threat assessment.
